document_data.name: Mestel
document_data.mainbody: '''Mestel''' was an old and powerful merchant organization and a noble family from the city of [[Arrabar]] in the [[Vilhon Reach]]{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20080519045858/http://ww2.wizards.com/Books/Wizards/?doc=fr_vambrancp| title = Character Profile: Vambran Matrell| accessdate = 12-21-2021| date = 12-21-2021}}
document_data.Organization: House Mestel was one of the oldest and most powerful merchant families of Arrabar. The oldest families held nine-tenth of the city's wealth while the younger merchant houses, such as [[House Matrell]], fought for the one-tenth share of the market. The estate of the Mestel family was a sprawling high-spired mansion surrounded by a grove of [[suth]] trees planted along the estate's perimeter. Like all other mercantile houses of Arrabar, Mestels housed a sizable mercenary and guard force.
document_data.History:
[[Obiron Matrell]] was born in the {{YearlinkName|1292}} to one of the lordlings of the great Mestel family of Arrabar. Mestels denounced the distant-born bastard and left him no choice but to change his name and establish his own merchant organization â€“ House Matrell. Even after Obiron, along with his wife [[Hetta Matrell|Hetta]], built a small merchant empire, House Matrell was still looked down upon by Mestels.

In the {{YearlinkName|1373}}, [[Falagh Mestel]] became involved in a plot against House Matrell.
